title: Annual Training Camp 2025
description: The Annual Training Camp for all cadets will be held at the university grounds. Attendance is mandatory.

title: Drill Practice Schedule Update
description: New drill practice timings are announced for the upcoming Republic Day parade preparations. Check the notice board.

title: Inter-Group Sports Competition
description: Registrations are now open for the annual Inter-Group Sports Competition. Last date to register is Oct 25th.

title: Cadet Welfare Society Meeting
description: A meeting will be held to discuss the agenda for the next quarter. All senior cadets are requested to join.
